Text: Andrew Wojtanik:  To get to the National Geographic Bee finals, he survived two tiebreakers to advance to the final round against 13-year-old Matthew Wells of Montana, beating him to win a $25,000 scholarship.

Triplets:<Andrew Wojtanik
2:
--------------------
Text: Andrew Wojtanik:  He credits his success to a 384-page book he compiled, which is now an official study guide for the Bee, called "Afghanistan to Zimbabwe: Country Facts That Helped Me Win the National Geographic Bee", which was published in 2004.
Triplets:<Andrew Wojtanik
